it.apice.sapere.api.space
Interface OntologyHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
LSAspace, LSAspaceCore<RDFStmtIterType>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLSAspaceCoreImpl, LSAspaceImpl
public interface OntologyHandler

This interface models an entity capable of loading ontologies.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 URI[] getLoadedOntologies()
           Retrieves a list of all ontologies that this entity is aware of.
 void loadOntology(URI ontoURI)
           Instructs the LSA-space to load and exploit the provided URI.
 

Method Detail

loadOntology

void loadOntology(URI ontoURI)
                  throws SAPEREException

Instructs the LSA-space to load and exploit the provided URI.

Parameters:
ontoURI - Where the ontology can be found
Throws:
SAPEREException - Cannot load ontology

getLoadedOntologies

URI[] getLoadedOntologies()

Retrieves a list of all ontologies that this entity is aware of.

Returns:
A list of all loaded ontologies
